about_the_game:
To The Entwine is a rouge-lite bullet hell, Focused on combat and exploration

Dive into a post-apocalyptic world in this action packed rouge-lite bullet hell. Uncover the secrets of the world's downfall in the single-player story mode or fight through hordes of enemies and explore the desolate landscape collecting vital research along the way in rouge-lite mode

Features

  • Fight hordes of enemies

  • Collect Research to learn about the past

  • Experience the story of what caused the apocalyptic event

  • Procedurally generated levels

  • Customise your gun with various mods

  • Hidden collectables to find throughout the levels

name: To The Entwine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
